attributes.action: Stop lockdowns, stop tiers and the tories we are not prisoners!!!
attributes.additional_details: Get all tories involved with lockdown and tiers out of power.
attributes.background: Stop all lockdowns and tiers they do not work. You're destroying our economy. We are not prisoners.

rejection.details:
Lift local lockdowns and Covid-19 restrictions in England: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/551469

You may also wish to sign this petition calling for a General Election: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/557074
